definition: abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: M. considered himself a battler, a fighter.
sentences.chinese: 仍将自己看作是一个战斗者，斗士。

sentences.english: The army said dozens of Taliban militants and several soldiers were killed.
sentences.chinese: 军队说几十个塔里班战斗者和一些军人被杀。

sentences.english: The surging blood of our warriors .
There will need to be a balance found by Fighters for their stamina level and special hits.
sentences.chinese: 在战斗者之间，需要有一种耐久和特殊的撞击平衡。

definition: berserker (Norse warrior or fantasy role-playing character)
lit. veteran of a hundred battles (idiom)/fig. experienced/seasoned
